interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2016/02/16
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Sean Ellis'], 'Producers': ['Lene Bausager', 'Yves Chevalier', 'Franck Chorot', 'Marshall Leviten', 'Winnie Li'], 'Starring': ['Lena Headey', 'Richard Jenkins', 'Asier Newman'], 'Studio': ['Lionsgate']}
Review Text: It's a little if not a lot surreal, yet, it does a good job of conveying the idea of the different aspects of each of us, especially that shadow side, that sometimes wants to and is willing to kill off the well adjusted "good" side of us.
Review Title: it does a good job of conveying the idea of the different aspects ...
Rating: 4.0
